remarks: Lemma for well-founded recursion.  Here, we compute the value of the recursive definition generator.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 21-Apr-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
statement:
wfrlem11.1 $e |- R We A $.
wfrlem11.2 $e |- R Se A $.
wfrlem11.3 $e |- F = wrecs ( R , A , G ) $.
wfrlem12 $p |- ( y e. dom F -> ( F ` y ) = ( G ` ( F |` Pred ( R , A , y ) ) ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d G y $.
$d R y $.
